Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the legislative commission on the development of rural resources to study the effectiveness of pond and lake management programs
Summary: Authorizes the legislative commission on the development of rural resources to study the effectiveness of pond and lake management programs; provides for the comprehensive control and mitigation of harmful algal blooms in both marine and fresh water; provides for emergency response to water contaminations by algal bloom or hypoxia.
LawCode: Amd §83-i, Leg L; amd §§20, 21 & 912, Exec L; amd §9, Cons Dists L; add Art 17 Title 23 §§17-2301 - 17-2309, En Con L; amd §225, Pub Health L; add §6004-a, Ed L; amd §1285, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to authorizing the legislative commission on the development of rural resources to study the effectiveness of pond and lake management programs; to amend the executive law, the soil and water conservation districts law, the environmental conservation law, the public health law, the education law and the public authorities law, in relation to the mitigation and control of harmful algal blooms; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
